plot: Three shopkeepers' lifelong friendship is put to the test when two of their children decide to marry despite their religious and ethnic differences.
title: Take, Ianke si Cadîr
plot_es: Three shopkeepers' lifelong friendship is put to the test when two of their children decide to marry despite their religious and ethnic differences.
plot_en: Three shopkeepers' lifelong friendship is put to the test when two of their children decide to marry despite their religious and ethnic differences.
